GenTokens.summary: Represents a collection of replacement token strings.

SetTokens.summary: Sets the Token elements from the specified text.

GetNextToken.returns: The next token or null if not found.

BinarySearch.summary: Searches the entire sorted collection for an element with the specified value using the default comparer and returns a reference to the element. Returns a null object if the element is not found.
BinarySearch.returns: A reference to the element or null if not found.
